outputs.output_descr: The programme will support the implementation of National Gender Action Plan (NGAP) which operationalize related MDGs and the Beijing Plan of Action while being guided by CEDAW. The Programme will also support advocacy work on gender equity and equality.

project_descr: This program will support the National Union of Eritrean Women in strengthening its Human and Institutional capacity.
project_title: JOINT PROGRAMME ON GENDER EQUITY IN ERITREA
